website_summaries.verdict: A simple, elegant, accurate, and brightly lit solution. Available for 95% of vehicles  with an OBD2 or EUOBD interface.
pros: Displays driving speed, engine speed, battery voltage, instantaneous fuel consumption, average fuel consumption, and fatigue driving reminders
Nano-technology eliminates double reflections, making it clear and easy to read
Automatic and manual brightness adjustment mode allows you to drive without glare
Supports vehicles with hybrid and auto stop and start feature
cons: Overspeed alarm range is too low for some users

customer_reviews.title: Made Check Engine Light come on!
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to install this in my 2017 Dodge Challenger. It was pretty easy to install and seemed easy to use. Looked great on the windshield, HOWEVER, it did make my Check Engine Light come on! I have 10k miles on it and it's serviced by Dodge only and, in fact, was just serviced by Dodge today and the light was definitely not on! I can't use this product if this happens so I will be returning it. Buyer BEWARE! Update: Went and had my check engine code read and it was U0001 Problem high speed bus/communication control module. This HUD plugged into the OBDII port makes it so my ECU cannot communicate properly with the car.
customer_reviews.author: michael thomas

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you tend to drive with your hands in a place that blocks your speedometer
customer_reviews.text: This little device does an excellent job at helping me keep my eye on the road vs looking down to check my speedometer. The accuracy is a little off depending on how fast you're going, but once you figure out how much it overstates your speed you'll be fine. Plus, this helps even further at keeping your speed down. Pretty easy to install and see even in the daytime without the reflective film (which I prefer). I don't mind the slight shadow like reflection on my windshield (better than that ugly film).
customer_reviews.author: Scottie C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't read in daylight at all
customer_reviews.text: Loved the simplicity of this unit, all I wanted was speed in a simple readout. They claimed that you can use this without the windshield film, but in the day that's just not true... It's nearly impossible to read in the day. I tried the film but it's really gaudy and distracting to me so I removed it as quickly as i out it on. In the settings you can adjust the brightness but even at full it's just not enough. Ultimately i returned the unit and went with another that has it's own display screen and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: SconnieSven

customer_reviews.title: The device itself is great, does what it says it does and does ...
customer_reviews.text: The device itself is great, does what it says it does and does it perfectly. The reflective screen is kind of annoying though as it shows the whole device, which makes it a bit hard to see and tends to get really annoying as it also takes away from the effect. The reason I put this at 2 stars is because it says it does not need a reflection film yet it does, and without the reflection film it isn't visible.
customer_reviews.author: shalom janashvili

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I Installed it and it worked for a whole 10 minutes the screen died out. Very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Levy

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Sherox delivers what it supposed to do. I can recommend the product. I use it to display speed only. I'm not interested in any other function, but you're able to calibrate accordance to your analogue speedometer well. The update of the speed display is fast and seems reliable. The package includes a small screen that enhances clarity and eliminates the shadowing effect that otherwise blurs the display on the naked windscreen. Changing parameters straightforward but done with a very simple interface not so easy to master.
customer_reviews.author: Hans F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & functional, but could use some design improvements
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, easy to install. Had to spend a few days driving with it and playing with the speed adjustment setting to find the one that worked best. Be sure to install it low on the dash, near the windshield. My dash is curved so I needed to twist the unit slightly to get the numbers to project horizontally on the windshield. One shortfall of the design is the housing has a lip on the side facing into the vehicle, hiding the screen itself from view. But that lip tapers down towards the outward facing side, making the quite bright screen very visible from outside the vehicle, particularly at night
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Easy install with the wire easily hidden along the sunscreen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the headsup display I hoped for. Being color blind I have difficulty distinguishing my instrument panel's red gauge pointers on its black background. The subtle blue image, day and night variated, allows me to see my speed without leaving my eyes from the road and maintaining conformance with the posted speed limits. Easy install with the wire easily hidden along the sunscreen apex and door moulding. Though a reflective screen is provided, I didn't see it necessary as it would be a visual distraction. A well thought out design at a readonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed & MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I tried the fancier ones but do you really need temp / MPG / voltage on the screen all the time? I've purchased this device 3 times. The first time it worked like a charm for a year and then ceased to function after it got baked in stupidly hot weather. The second time they changed the software making the device incompatible with the other things plugged in to my ODBII port. And now the 3rd time. They've fixed the software and made the instructions easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Mozzer502

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions; but this item was defective. When I started the car, it simply counted from 1 to 5 and then shut off. I went through the options, and changed several, but it never changed the behavior. Unfortunately, I waited longer than 30 days to install this, so I'm stuck with it. I contacted the seller twice, but no luck there either. Don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: kirk78h

customer_reviews.title: Works great in F250 unless trailer is attached.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install in my 2015 F250. Image does have a ghost unless you use the reflective film, but with the film the image is sharp even in bright sun. Only problem is likely a problem with my truck not the product, quits working when I have a trailer attached. Immediately resumed working when I disconnected the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: There is a 1 sec or so delay but it's fine for knowing the speed. It is visible during the day with the provided reflector. You need to set the calibration or it won't work. I find that 104 works for the 17 Accord and 106 works for the 15 Sienna.
customer_reviews.author: J. DANG

customer_reviews.title: Worse than awful programming instructions. It took me 2 weeks to figure it out
customer_reviews.text: Great little heads up display if you just want speedometer. I put it on the left lower corner of the window so it’s easy to see but not in your line of vision. The installation is simple put the program instructions are worse than awful. The distributor should rewrite the programming instructions and not refer you to the English translation of the Chinese instructions. It took me 2 weeks to get this programmed. There is one wheel to do all the programming but different things happen depending on how long you push in the wheel..They don’t tell you about this in the instructions
customer_reviews.author: robert brenner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not using the film. Slight double image, but nothing too bad. Good during day or night. Needed a slight speed adjustment from 108 to 103. It's dead on now. Automatically turns off when car shuts off, unlike many other obd2 devices. 4 stars because the adhesive tape it comes with doesn't work for a dash with curves in it. Some Velcro fixed that problem.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Skip if you use sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: When wearing sunglasses, it's almost impossible to see the image, even if at max brightness. Wish was better quality because it's the most appealing design. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin K.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This HUD is clearly visible during day and night. Installation was a breeze, comes with a black flat cable that connects to the car computer, easy to hide and a reflective film. In my case, I found it unnecessary, so I removed it. Initially, the speed was not accurate but following the instructions, it worked perfectly. If you are looking for a simple HUD to just see the speed, at a super low price, look no further, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: userccs

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The projection is easily readable without disturbing. Automatic brightness adjustment works fine. Without using the provided reflection film, the result is a double projection (entering and leaving the front window) - not perfect, but good enough. Unfortunately, it is not possible to adjust the speed scaling correctly to match the speedometer: Either it is wrong at high speed or at low speed.
customer_reviews.author: Urs Keller

customer_reviews.title: Keeps restarting, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a day then keeps restarting by itself. One out of six times it might stay on. I bought two of them and both have the same problem. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carr

customer_reviews.title: did not work as described
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get the unit to works as instructed. Although it states no screen needed, they sent one with the unit and had the item worked it would have needed a screen to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright and accurate with double image. Reflection film is  required.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to install and bright enough. But you need reflection film, with out reflection film you will see double image.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflyangel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Omg it’s perfect for my car , I love it ,everyone ask where did I buy it ! Definitely recommend it ! Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everday use
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and got so many people asking where I got it. It is really helpful because I don't need to look away from the street and it tells me how fast I'm going.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Nice HUD
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple HUD. Works perfect on a Lexus 2018 rx350
customer_reviews.author: JudyK

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. It just needs to be calibrated because it's just within the 35-40 mph speed that it's correct; the slower speeds seem to display a higher number, and faster speeds seem to display a lower number. Help, anyone?
customer_reviews.author: JaB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love it my speed is on windshield just what i expected thank you
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great HUD. Simple. Small. Works. Needs better brightness controls...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Does it with a compact and un-bothersome form. It's a bit bright though when in photosensative mode so and doesn't seem to let you adjust the brightness while letting it adjust itself in photosensative mode (so daytime, too bright - night time, still to bright). Also, just wish it showed a little more info simulaniously...
customer_reviews.author: Wanai

customer_reviews.title: wut the heck
customer_reviews.text: lame instructions it just made me mad and i never got it to work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but lacks ability to calibrate
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful plug and play speedometer HUD display for car. The only thing I did not like is slight inaccuracy. I reads 2-3 miles more than the actual speed. I wish there should be an option to calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: SANJEEV GUPTA

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers mentioned, it counts from 1 to 5 and then shuts off. I tried changing the car type settings and still doesn't work. Has to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, but without film it provide double image on windscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Domantas ikus

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: With the intense light here in Vegas, during the day it’s hard to see without using the film. It was a little off till I was told how to adjust the readings. Now it’s good. No brained to install.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on 2020 GLC 300
customer_reviews.text: Main reason for the one star is that it doesn’t work for 2020 GLC 300 4MATIC, which is what I need it for. I tried it +20 times to get it to work and no luck. As soon as I plug it into another car, it works instantly
customer_reviews.author: Miraj Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: my was blurry! I had to use the reflective film!  i bought it because it says
customer_reviews.text: my was blurry! I had to use the reflective film! i bought it because it says you do not need the film
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Simple install and exactly what I wanted. Didn't use the film because I thought it looked dumb on the windshield in the daytime.
customer_reviews.author: Sengphet Phothisane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, accuracy bit less
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install, but accuracy wise I am seeing some delay in the display, mostly +/- 2 points is coming from the actual speed
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: Sunlight ruins the item.
customer_reviews.text: When the sun is out it is almost impossible to see the info.
customer_reviews.author: George Macneil

customer_reviews.title: Too dim on highest setting!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a little brighter it’s nearly invisible unless you try to focus I rather just look at my dash sometimes. But here’s a picture of it on “0 MPH”
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Scammed, paid $40 for the described model, received a model that sells $26.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffster

customer_reviews.title: Can you please help me show the mph?? ...
customer_reviews.text: Can you please help me show the mph?? I can’t seem to figure it out, I follow Instructions and when I exit the menu it shows me 2 dashes and it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Lennep

customer_reviews.title: This is great if u want a simple and easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great if u want a simple and easy to use HUD without all of the unnecessary info that would create distractions.
customer_reviews.author: N8 NG

customer_reviews.title: Not bright at all
customer_reviews.text: Extremely dim. I can barely see the speed. “No reflection film needed” is bs.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I think it is not the same thing
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, I stumbled. It was not exactly the same as the imagination, and the plug did not match the car.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best prouduct I’ve purchased in a long time. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Hud
customer_reviews.text: I can’t figure out how to keep it on but it turns on
customer_reviews.author: Toney2k

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It turns on to show the N, E, W and S but then turns off
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hill

customer_reviews.title: the manual can be more intuitive and it would be much better if the display has a hood so the LED ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install. the flat cable and low profile OBD connector hide well. The display is bright and the double imaging effect is much less than the other models so may not need the reflective windscreen tape. Improvement? the manual can be more intuitive and it would be much better if the display has a hood so the LED won't directly shine at the driver's eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johns

customer_reviews.title: The film is included and is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works well. All I wanted was a heads up speedo and this unit meets the need at a reasonable price. Despite what they say about their "nano-technoloty", you do need to use a reflective window film with it. The film is included and is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Works just ok in LA
customer_reviews.text: It works but every time when sun too hot then it will shot down when I driving. Even the AC is full power and the car inside is cool enough, it just won’t back till next day I restart my car. Still no clue how to fix this problem but still works for most of the time, just a little bit annoying. I live in LA, sunny every day.
customer_reviews.author: sakipppp

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Uncluttered, crisp display. I recommend using Velcro strips rather than the supplied 3M dots, for adjustment purposes. Simple to install, easy to use, allows you to keep your eyes on the road at all times. Fantastic product, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Banks

customer_reviews.title: Didn't go to mph
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 minutes, couldn't set to mph. It was stuck on khlm
customer_reviews.author: Jonny AmaZ0N

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The idea was great. It would work great if it showed correct mph info.
customer_reviews.author: Karate fun

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item just so it would display the speed I am driving.. This works good and it was very easy to install. It works very well at night.and during the day you can see the display but just not as easy.as at night. I did not need the reflection film that came with it. I have a Honda Fit. The only negative is the enclosed instructions were not written clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcycle

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a novelty that wears off
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do - a little bit of adjusting and it can be reasonably accurate for speed. It does adjust brightness when set to automatically do so. It's interesting and fun for a few weeks and then it becomes annoying - this little speed light in the middle of your windshield. I know I can move it to different places. It just becomes something that I don't look at other than to distract me. Nothing on the product, but I think you'll find it just a novelty too. Not much usefulness, but I'm not sure what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: This HUD unit was perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This HUD unit was perfect for what I wanted. It shows the speed, battery voltage, and water temperature. I don't need a crazy Star Trek looking display on my windshield with multi colored light graphs etc. It is a very compact unit and seems to be holding up well. The only detraction I will give it is that it took forever to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Pumi

customer_reviews.title: HUD that actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered early which is a plus since I am overseas and mail can be slow. Setup was super easy with supplied instructions and email that I received. Had to adjust the setting from 108 to 102 in order to get it lined up with the truck speedometer, but after that it is spot on. Since I primarily got this to display kmh vs mph, I have not messed with other options. Makes driving in Germany a lot easier as now I do not have to keep looking down at the dashboard while driving. I use it along with the Waze app when going long distances, especially in areas that have a lot of speed cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but has design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but would recommend Velcro vice little sticky rubber dots. Also, poor choice for reflective film. Use a light car window tint film. The one supplied has a silver base so you literally see a silver box on your windshield when looking at your car from the outside. Or, improve on the technology a bit to prevent the use of a film.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Turcic

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bright, easy to install and easy to calibrate. However, you do need the screen - otherwise you get the dreaded double image. I just wanted something with a simple display (without the fancy bars & charts, etc.) and this was exactly that.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanBoy

customer_reviews.title: it's a fantastic product. It's very simple
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost a year now, it's a fantastic product. It's very simple, displaying just speed, engine temp or the current. I did not use the reflection film. Yes, it's a bit blurry but not annoyingly blurry. the brightness is really good. There is no problem seeing it even in full sun and nice and dim at night causing no no visual distraction.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I installed it today So far working good. They say it doesn’t need refraction film But ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed it today So far working good. They say it doesn’t need refraction film But I think it will need refrection film for clear to see the screen
customer_reviews.author: yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this in our car since we arrived in Germany and it works great. Seems to be accurate. Display isn't always crystal clear and we didn't use the reflection film but weather in Germany is constantly changing so it has more to do with that than the product. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to install- looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. I was worried if it was going to project bright enough. But the projected image look great! I haven't put the reflective film on yet- don't think I'll need to. I struggled at first to change from metric to MPH because the directions are not that great. But once I played with it, I found it was pretty easy. Its a no frill's display, showing only speed, but that is all I really wanted since my new car doesn't have a digital speedometer. I hope it keeps working for a few years. -rbt
customer_reviews.author: rbt

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for basic HUD
customer_reviews.text: Works well including the auto brightness. Removed 1 star due to the arcane way of using settings. **update** 2 years old and still working great!
customer_reviews.author: ScottDR

customer_reviews.title: DOES need reflection film
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use without film as advertised. does OK at night, but gets lost in any daylight, and unusable with sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Tallowood

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I installed this speed display and went for a ride to test it out. It would only sporadically display the speed which I'm sure wasnt even correct. I really wanted this to work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Margherite Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: It’s off by 2-5+mph depending on your speed
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit however it is defective as another user claims it’s off by 2mph under 60mph and I found that over 60 it goes to 4mph off. I have a 2015 Dodge Grand Caravan that has a digital mph display and its clearly off. I’m am going to try and find a more accurate unit. Edit- after another 800 miles with the unit it was determined that the more speed the more inaccurate it becomes. It’s a nice unit but it needs to be accurate. :( returned!
customer_reviews.author: patwreck

customer_reviews.title: Cool, and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad gadget, works great! My Nissan doesn't show engine temp, so I overheated it, after wasting ton of money I bought this to prevent something like that!
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. It did not give accurate speed data on my car. It seems to work great for some people but my car (ML63) was not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Anderson

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I try to install it but it’s not the best product for the money what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: zalme tessler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your $, Display Stops Working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month, then turned off & works 30% of the time, now nothing, it beeps but no display.
customer_reviews.author: alessandro montagna

customer_reviews.title: Easy insatall
customer_reviews.text: I have 2018 toyota higlander. I work and install very good. Only mpg front 2ml. When you drive 40mpg it show 42mpg. But still very good!
customer_reviews.author: SABUHI

customer_reviews.title: Does what it do
customer_reviews.text: Work great at night. Daytime can’t see it really. Other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the effort.. kept switching off by itself and is not visible in daylight
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Nothing. Another MADE PRODUCT MADE AT CHINA
customer_reviews.text: It’s a stupid product. I returned one and the 2nd throw in trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Confirm the brand
customer_reviews.text: Listed as the Sherox brand, but the box says Caraprise. Not sure about that 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Derek L.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than GPS version - good value
customer_reviews.text: Much better than GPS version. Calibration easy and results accurate. Performs well for this price range (cheap :-))
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G Sapsford, AAPP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The HUD turns off sometimes, I wrote the seller but still have issues
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Loved it! Double sided tape didn’t work but I just used glue.
customer_reviews.author: nickalas payne

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but it works, terrible broken english instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it's advertised that you don't need a reflector film....unless you want to see double images like all other HUDs reflecting on a windshield, you definitely need the film, I think they agree since they send films with the HUD device....other than that I agree there should be more options to set the MPH alarm, as it is you can only set 25, 35, 45, 55, 65 75 and 80, what about 60 or even higher than 80? you should be able to set the alarm for these speeds...just as an example.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This product does not match the factory speedo or my ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does not match the factory speedo or my GPS unit. It is 2 to 3 mph fast . I contacted the people and ask if it could be calibrated and never got a answer. It shows well on the windshield but you must always adjust the reading to actual speed. I cannot return it because it is past the date to return. I have purchased another brand and it is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not install this product if you do not drive the vehicle frequently - it WILL drain the battery!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a utility truck that I drive about once a week. This device, while it is neat and I appreciated the functionality of it, will ever-so-slightly drain your vehicle's battery. Since I do not use my truck as a commuter vehicle and drive it infrequently, this resulted in me being unable to start my vehicle. Again, this is likely not an issue if you install this product in a daily-commuter vehicle. Just a problem if you don't drive the vehicle very often.
customer_reviews.author: angsqr

product_meta.title: SHEROX 3.5" Car HUD Head Up Display with OBD2/EUOBD Interface Plug & Play Vehicle Speed KM/h MPH, OverSpeed Warning, Water Temperature, Battery Voltage, Mileage Measurement
feature_bullets: ✅ SHEROX CAR HUD - A simple, elegant, accurate, and brightly lit solution, without all of the unnecessary info that would create distractions.

✅ NOT compatible with All-Electric vehicle/ Diesel vehicle/ Truck/ Van, Compatible with most fuel car and Hybrid car with an OBD2/ EUOBD interface, easy to install, plug and play. This HUD support vehicles with Hybrid and auto stop/start feature, You can refer to the user manual: Pressed inward and hold to Start setting mode, Enter settings 13, Select car category 1 (Hybrid) or 2 (auto stop/start)

✅ 3.5" SCREEN HD DISPLAY - Clear and easier to read. Automatic and manual brightness adjustment mode,driving without glare. Because the front windshield of the car is double glass, there will inevitably be a slight double image (please refer to the picture in the description), but this does not affect your use, so we do not recommend pasting the reflector film on the front windshield.

✅ FOUR DISPLAY FUNCTION - Vehicle Speed KM/h MPH, Water temperature, Voltage, Travel mileage (free switch between km and (MPH) miles, Please read the user manual). THREE ALARM FUNCTIONS - Overspeed alarm, High temperature alarm, Low voltage alarm.
✅ AUTO POWER ON/OFF - Head up display start and off with vehicle started and shutdown, effective protection of the car battery. Retaining the manual switch mode,more easy to control HUD.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars167 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
